adrFormatAddress: 397 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
I found these guys on an instagram ad and decided to give them a shot. we have a four year old sectional with mild wear-n-tear and some general pet stains (cat people out there-you know what I am talking about!). We were under the impression that it was time to replace the sofa but when I saw the ad for these guys I figured we’d give the ol’ girl one last chance.
I am SO GLAD i called them. I called on Tuesday…they fit me in Friday with a window of 10-12…I asked if they could be here right at 10 (waiting for home service/repair ppl is the worst) and they said “no prob”.
He was here RIGHT AT 10…came in…was friendly, efficient, respectful of my space (and in general)….after about 1.5 hours, my sofa was basically brand new. I WOULD HAPPILY PAY MUCH MORE for the incredible service and remarkable results. If you are considering these guys for any service, DO IT! 6 outta 5 stars.

originalText.text: I have been using Robert for YEARS. I wish I could clone him for other projects! If you're looking for a highly-skilled carpet and sofa cleaner, who is reliable, professional, friendly, and fairly priced, look no further than Steam Pro NYC Carpet, Rug and Upholstery Cleaning! You will NOT be disappointed!

originalText.text: I have used a lot of upholstery cleaning services but since I found Steam Pro I have only wanted to use them! Robert is friendly, prompt, and professional, and you can tell how much he cares about getting your rugs, sofa, and chairs spotless. Especially now that I have a dog, he is the only cleaner I will ever use. You will not be sorry for choosing Steam Pro!!

originalText.text: Robert was the best!  Informative, professional, punctual.  I have never had anything professionally cleaned before. My furniture / rug are 4 years old and were starting to look a little “ratty”.  They now look brand new again.  They are competitively priced too.  Looks like I found my new Steam Cleaners!!  Highly recommend this company!!

originalText.text: I made a appointment with Robert from steam pro to clean my furniture before the holidays. I bought my couches 6 years ago. It was either get them cleaned or throw them out because they were so dirty, embarrassed to say. I couldn’t believe how clean they came out. They looked brand new. So impressed I decided to have him clean my carpet. Once again he did an amazing job! Robert was very professional and knowledgeable. I will definitely use his service again!
